overview: Sanctuary live at Amphitheater Gelsenkirchen, Gelsenkirchen, Germany. Setlist: 1.  Arise and Purify  2. Let the Serpent Follow Me 3.  Seasons of Destruction 4. Die for My Sins 5. Battle Angels 6. Exitium (Anthem of the Living) 7. Question Existence Fading  8. Frozen 9. The Year the Sun Died 10. Future Tense 11. Taste Revenge
title: Sanctuary: [2015] Rock Hard Festival
